metadata.title: CVE-2023-5173 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In a non-standard configuration of Firefox, an integer overflow could haveoccurred based on network traffic (possibly under influence of a localunprivileged webpage), leading to an out-of-bounds write to privilegedprocess memory. *This bug only affects Firefox if a non-standard preferenceallowing non-HTTPS Alternate Services (`network.http.altsvc.oe`) isenabled.* This vulnerability affects Firefox < 118.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
mozjs38 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
